MoRe NoTes:

Well I&#039;ve ripped all the other Splinter Cells&#039;, so here&#039;s the original.
This version RIP contains also the BONUS missions intergrated which
have become rather impossible to find anymore. Fits my personal &#039;criteria&#039;
for having nothing removed, so this is a complete RIP.

Game is a sweet reward for those of you without the privlege of meeting most
new games system requirements that are fucking bullshit anymore.

Sucks to have to repeat this, but, GAME IS NOT TESTED ON VISTA.

Although many of these rips will work on Vista, there are many
that will not. This is not due to the rip itself, but to the 
games internal engines, most designed for the XP o/s. 
Perhaps someday in the future microshaft will address this in 
one of its soon to be many service packs for Vista.

In the meantime, I must continue to state these warnings.,,,
And many game developers are working away just to simply make
patches for their games to run on Vista, that&#039;s bullshit.
